Creating a virtual file server

Create virtual file servers so you can create file systems.

Before you begin

  • Create file pools on a storage system.

  • Configure ports.

  • Obtain the required IP address and subnet mask information.

Procedure

  1. Enter a label for the Virtual File Server.
  2. Enter an IP address for the Virtual File Server.
  3. Enter the subnet mask.
  4. Select a port.
  5. Click Submit.

    A job is added on the Jobs page to create the virtual file server.
